components.description: A person on a surfboard, riding on a wave in the ocean. Wears a wetsuit or board shorts in most versions.
components.title: Surfer

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a crossed vertical line beneath it, used as a representation for women. Often used on International Women's Day.
components.title: Female Sign

title: Woman Surfing

emoji_net_data.definition: The female version of the ??¬†Surfer emoji. The Woman Surfing emoji is a sequence of the ?? Surfer, ? Female Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 http://emojipedia.org/woman-surfing/
emoji_net_data.name: woman surfing

bn:00094620v: To ride a wave, usually on a surfboard.
To use a surfboard; to surf.
Ride the waves of the sea with a surfboard

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00075390n: Surfing is a surface water sport in which the wave rider, referred to as a surfer, rides on the forward or deep face of a moving wave, which is usually carrying the surfer towards the shore.
Surfing is a surface water sport in which the participant is carried along the face of a breaking wave, most commonly using a surfboard.
The sport of riding a surfboard toward the shore on the crest of a wave
Sport that consists of riding a wave
The sport of riding a surfboard using the power of the waves
The pastime or sport of riding surf on a surfboard.
Maneuver where the surfer turns and surfs back towards where the wave is breaking.

apple_vendor_description: The woman surfing emoji on Apple devices captures a moment of exhilarating motion, with her form dynamically balanced atop a wave, embodying courage and skill in Apple's distinctive glossy 3D style. The water is depicted with realistic lighting and smooth gradients, creating a sense of its powerful, translucent movement, while her wetsuit shows subtle texture. This emoji, as seen on Apple products, celebrates athleticism, adventure, water sports, and overcoming challenges with confidence and grace.
